mapper.select: select u.uid,u.uname,u.pass,u.spass,u.sex,u.age,u.tel,u.inputdate,d.dname,e.level,u.jobId,j.job from user u,dept d,emplevel e,job j where u.did=d.did and u.lid=e.lid and u.jobid=j.jobid

SELECT u.uId, u.dId, u.lId, u.jobId, u.uName, u.pass, u.spass, u.sex, u.age, u.tel, u.inputDate, d.`dName`, e.level, j.job FROM USER u, dept d, job j, emplevel e WHERE u.dId = d.dId AND u.jobId = j.jobId AND u.lId = e.lId AND u.dId = #{dId}
select * from user where uname=#{uName} and pass=#{pass}
select u.uid,u.uname,u.pass,u.spass,u.sex,u.age,u.tel,u.inputdate,d.dname,e.level,j.job from user u,dept d,emplevel e,job j where u.did=d.did and u.lid=e.lid and u.jobid=j.jobid and uId=#{uId}

SELECT u.uid, u.uname, u.pass, u.spass, u.sex, u.age, u.tel, u.inputdate, d.dname FROM USER u, dept d, job j, emplevel e WHERE u.`dId` = d.`did` AND u.`jobId` = j.`jobId` AND u.`lId` = e.`lId` AND u.`jobId` = #{jobId}
select u.uid,u.uname,u.pass,u.spass,u.sex,u.age,u.tel,u.inputdate,d.dname,e.level,j.job from user u,dept d,emplevel e,job j where u.did=d.did and u.lid=e.lid and u.jobid=j.jobid and uId=#{uId}
mapper.delete: delete from user where jobId=#{jobId} and lId=#{lId}
